title: Plz revert Galio changes
body: Okay so the issue I have is that Galio is ment to be a tank, but with these buffs he has better scaling than most mid lane mages AND he get free stats from his abilities AND ap items generally have health, its just stupid, how did this get past PBE, why is a "Tank" able to deal more dmg than a mage and still be tankier.... rio wtf is going on? Like I understand that ekko and the like where being abused as quasi tanks and so you made them scale better and nerfed base dmg, but Galio is a Tank HE DOESNT NEED DAMAGE, he was fine the way he was, at best the should of just given him a small scaling buff (if the idea was to nerf his tank dmg), why did he have to scale 30% more on his passive and 15% on his q, plus 1% more per 100ap. The actual hell.

replies.body: Galio is blance right now, the player you vs probly better than you. Or you have no idea what you are doing.

To say that another player has no idea what they're doing without actually knowing said individual or having any context and to discount their opinions off the bat is a pretty shitty thing to do. People have different backgrounds and perspectives, and people are entitled to their own opinions. I respect that you believe Galio is balanced and I respect that others believe that Galio isn't balanced. I have no stake on the issue, but I respect y'all  regardless.

Dont assume i havent checked his rank and game play before making my remark. Galio strong point is wave clear and R roam. The guy that complain galio does too much damage, probly face tank galio while his damage reduction is active and eat every skill shot under the sun.

No I had just Faced PURE AP Galio, which is my complaint, case in point they had to hot fix him to make him better (though riot still doesn't follow their own logic on Tanks), I don't mind that he had decent wave clear before, its juts that this change is waaaaay too much, also plz tell me what my ranks is since you "Dont assume i havent checked his rank".
